titles.title: A resolution to authorize the printing of a collection of the rules of the committees of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/24/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Requires that a collection of the rules of the committees of the Senate be printed as a Senate document. Provides for 250 additional copies of such document for the Committee on Rules and Administration.
